title.rendered: Central California law firm Baker Manock & Jensen unveils new website

content.rendered:
Baker Manock & Jensen, one of the oldest and most widely respected law firms in Central California, has launched a new website.

Headquartered in Fresno, BMJ’s many practice areas take their attorneys statewide. Their principal focus is on serving private businesses, owners, and executives. They are a full-service law firm with expertise in various industries, including agriculture, food processing, and manufacturing, and in disciplines from water law to complex tax and business planning. They are committed to providing quality legal services with integrity.

It had been quite a while since they had updated their website. The previous webpage sported a very dark color scheme, and they wanted the new website to be vibrant and engaging. They chose a bright, spring-like color scheme to underscore the modern law firm website design look and feel they wanted (see screenshot below).

The use of imagery was also a high priority for this project. Stock images of local industry and landmarks were curated to create a tone and provide cohesion with the color scheme throughout the website.

Visit Website Our Portfolio
